Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
clippers \clippers\ n. 1. a type of shears for cutting grass or shrubbery; as, hedge clippers.
Syn: clipper, hedge clippers. [WordNet 1.5]
2. a cutting device for cutting hair or finger nails; as, nail clippers.
Syn: clipper. [WordNet 1.5]
clippers n 1: shears for cutting grass or shrubbery [syn: {clipper}] 2: scissors for cutting hair or finger nails [syn: {clipper}]
